page.title: 02DOMESTIC LIFE & EDUCATION 1
page.content:
Of the 27 10 year olds in the class 4 are only children; 11 have only 1 brother or sister and 6 have 2. Only one has 3 sisters and 2 brothers. Only 1 child has a cooked{breakfast most days, 15 like{cereals,}7 start the day with tea and toast or a slice of bread; 4 come to school with{no {breakfast.}All the class except 3 live within 1500m of the school so 19 walk there, 2 use bicycles, 3 come by bus and 3 by car.
At{school}everybody likes games and most like Art & Craft and Movement or Dancing. All the class can swim; only 4 like{Maths!}School lunches are unpopular; even if they were really good 23 would like to go home, 13 eat the meal, 7 bring sandwiches and 7 go home for lunch.
